overview_of_class: The course introduces students to fundamental concepts in economics and finance in the context of decisions that arise in contemporary planning and management of social and environmentally-relevant engineering systems.
name: Economics and Finance for Engineers
title: MEAS CIV_ENV 205-0-1 Economics and Finance for Engineers

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The course introduces students to fundamental concepts in economics and finance in the context of decisions that arise in contemporary planning and management of social and environmentally-relevant engineering systems.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Engineering Economic Analysis by Newnan, Eschenbach and Lavelle, 13th Edition.

subject: CIV_ENV
